title: Did a Nightmare Come True? | Best of RGSO
description:
Did a nightmare come true for one couple after one of them had an actual nightmare?
Here is a preview of the story.
“My husband and I walk into a hotel room. It is a typical hotel room. Two beds, a dresser with a TV, and a small table. I must pee, so I put my stuff down on a bed, and walk into the bathroom. However, I notice immediately that the bathroom is not your typical hotel bathroom. First, to the left, there is a long, ornate vanity table that looks like it is made of wood. Immediately ahead is the toilet, but to the left - the same side as the vanity - is a small set of steps that leads down to door!

I think this is odd, but I sit down on the toilet to take care of business. Before I have a chance to pee, I notice that the door next to me slowly swings open, just a little bit.

I quickly get up and walk down the steps to the door. It is a very flimsy door, and I open it a little wider and find myself looking into a basement, with cement flooring and walls. There are washers and dryers. To the left, I see a man and a woman talking. They do not see me. They are talking in rapid, hushed tones, and they both look concerned.”
